content.text: Hey! I'm good. Just got back from a run.
Oh nice! I always wanted to get into running but I'm not very coordinated.
It's all about practice. I used to be really bad at it but I just kept at it.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook. It's a great way to relax and I love to experiment with new recipes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. My favorite band is Radiohead.
Oh cool! I've never really listened to them before. What are some of your favorite songs?
My favorite song is "Fake Plastic Trees". It's so beautiful and haunting.
I'll have to check it out. I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
You should! I think you'd like it.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm going to go make some dinner now. It was nice talking to you!
